Header.title: Your Personalized Treatment Plan
Header.subtitle: Based on your consultation, we've curated the perfect combination of treatments

Result.noTreatmentsDesc: Based on your selections and current conditions, we couldn't find suitable treatments at this time. Please review the details below for more information.

ActionButtons.ctaDescription: Ready to start your journey? Find qualified clinics near you or book a consultation to discuss your personalized treatment plan.

ShareModal.title: Share Your Results
ShareModal.description: Share your personalized treatment plan with friends or save it for later
ShareModal.privacyNote: Keep your results private or share them with trusted friends and family

descriptions.dermatology: Foundation treatments for skin health and texture

PriceBreakdown.title: Total Investment
PriceBreakdown.noteText: Prices are estimates based on average market rates. Final pricing may vary by clinic and individual treatment plans.

TimelineInfo.title: What is Treatment Timeline?
TimelineInfo.subtitle: Understanding your personalized treatment schedule
TimelineInfo.intro: Cosmetic treatments require proper spacing between sessions. This timeline shows the recommended order and timing for your personalized treatment plan.
TimelineInfo.skinRecoveryDesc: Your skin needs healing time between treatments
TimelineInfo.minimizeSideEffectsDesc: Adequate spacing reduces risks and complications
TimelineInfo.howToRead1: Session numbers indicate the recommended treatment order
TimelineInfo.howToRead2: Order is arranged for safety and effectiveness
TimelineInfo.howToRead3: You don't need all treatments - choose based on your goals
TimelineInfo.howToRead4: Multiple treatments cannot be done simultaneously
TimelineInfo.note1: Check downtime info on each treatment card
TimelineInfo.note2: Actual schedule adjusts after doctor consultation
TimelineInfo.note3: Some treatments can be combined in one session
TimelineInfo.note4: Choose based on your budget and schedule
TimelineInfo.adviceDesc: Schedule a free consultation to create your customized treatment plan.

TimelineView.dermatologyDesc: Skin health, acne, pigmentation & texture treatments
TimelineView.specialtyCareDesc: Body treatments, hair care & specialized procedures
TimelineView.journeyDesc: Follow this personalized timeline to achieve your aesthetic goals

JourneyPath.disclaimer: Timeline may vary based on individual response and clinic scheduling. Consult with your provider for a personalized treatment schedule.

DataLost.title: Data has been lost
